Plot: The story of the Apache chief and his armed resistance to the US Government's subjugation of his people.
Title: Geronimo: An American Legend
Writer: John Milius (story), John Milius (screenplay), Larry Gross (screenplay)
Actors: Jason Patric, Gene Hackman, Robert Duvall, Wes Studi
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
